Summaries.eng: Ninja Nonsense is an absurdist comedy series which stars Shinobu, a young girl training to become a ninja. However, the series does not focus on ninja training, instead focusing on Shinobu's lifestyle and friends through a series of disjointed comedic plot lines. Towards this purpose, each episode of the anime is split into two separate stories.
Summaries.jpn:
気分はいつも夢がぐるぐるで〜す!!

忍（シノブ）は、忍者学校に通う見習いくのいち。エッチな頭領・音速丸の指令「女子高生のパンティを奪取せよ」を成し遂げるため、普通の女子高生 楓（かえで）の部屋に侵入したのだが…。忍の妹・雅（ミヤビ）、そのほかサスケをはじめとする忍者たちを巻き込み、修行したり遊んだりワニに食われたり（!?）のドタバタハイテンションアニメ！

Titles.eng: Ninja Trainee Shinobu/The Head Master Appears
Titles.jpn: 見習い忍者、忍見参の巻/頭領、現るの巻

Summaries.eng: Ninja trainee Shinobu goes on a mission for her perverted headmaster to collect underwear from high school girls, first targeting Kaede Shiranui.

Titles.eng: Ninjas Elated Over Cherry Blossom Viewing/Shinobu Goes on a Date with Kaede
Titles.jpn: 忍者、花見で浮かれるの巻/忍、楓とデートするの巻

Summaries.eng: Rainy weather sends the bored ninjas to search for the Loch Ness Monster in their pond; ninja-master Onsokumaru and a masked Sasuke keep a close eye on a girl-girl dating spectacle.

Titles.eng: Onsokumaru Gets Angry/Shinobu Leaves the Manor
Titles.jpn: 音速丸、怒るの巻／忍、家を出るの巻

Summaries.eng: Onsokumaru gets angry at Shinobu's little sister, Miyabi and decides it's time for a little one-on-one; Shinobu is kicked out of the manor, and heads to Kaede's family.

Titles.eng: Ninjas Hate the Heat/Miyabi in Love
Titles.jpn: 忍者、暑がるの巻/雅、恋をするの巻

Summaries.eng: Rising temperatures give Onsokumaru a perfect opportunity to get Shinobu and Kaede into their swimsuits; Miyabi has a crush and uses the Ninja Pharmaceutical Group's special love potion to help things along.

Titles.eng: Onsokumaru Goes to Hell/The Ninjas Host a Summer Festival
Titles.jpn: 音速丸、地獄に落ちるの巻/忍者、夏祭りを行うの巻

Summaries.eng: Onsokumaru is sent to Hell and encounters demon schoolgirls, demon wives, and demon in-laws; when it's too hot to train, the ninjas plan a Summer Festival to brighten the mood.

Titles.eng: A Typhoon Arrives/The Ninjas Go Mushroom Picking
Titles.jpn: 台風がきたの巻/忍者、きのこ狩るの巻

Summaries.eng: With Shinobu stuck at Kaede's house as a typhoon looms, those left at the ninja manor witness Onsokumaru's darkest hour; when Onsokumaru offers his wisdom to a mushroom picking expedition, the ninjas are in for a magical ride.

Titles.jpn: 音速丸、くっつくの巻/忍、プレイボーるの巻

Summaries.eng: Onsokumaru becomes melded to his arch-nemesis Miyabi and the gang try to help detach him; when the men want to play baseball, the girls are told to take their games someplace else.

Titles.eng: Shinobu in Disguise/A Monster Plant Goes Crazy
Titles.jpn: ｢忍、化けるの巻/怪植物、暴れるの巻

Summaries.eng: Kaede's school holds a festival, complete with a haunted house; Shinobu gets a new pet, a cute and cuddly five metre tall monster plant.

Titles.eng: The Girls Get Warm/Kaede Gets Sick
Titles.jpn: 女の子、あったまるの巻/楓、風邪をひくの巻

Summaries.eng: At a hot spring, Onsokumaru tries to see some skin, but Miyabi's guardians stand in the way; when Kaede gets sick, Shinobu and Onsokumaru take care of her.

Titles.eng: The Ninjas Have Christmas/The Ninjas Are Cursed
Titles.jpn: 忍者、クリスマスるの巻/忍者、呪われるの巻

Summaries.eng: The ninjas celebrate their first Christmas and Kaede teaches them about the holiday spirit; a bit of year-end cleaning yields a box filled with misfortune, subjecting Kaede, Shinobu, and the rest of the ninjas to one bizarre curse after another.

Titles.eng: The Legend of Sasuke Begins/The Grateful Ninja
Titles.jpn: サスケ伝、始まるの巻/忍者、恩返しするの巻

Summaries.eng: Sasuke has an adventure filled with full-throttle action; the ninjas put on a play of the Grateful Crane story, but have trouble remembering how it goes.

Titles.jpn: 音速丸の秘密の巻/さらばニニンがシノブ伝の巻

Summaries.eng: Onsokumaru's secret comes to light, and the shocking truth threatens to change everything for Shinobu; with her goal of becoming a full-fledged ninja in sight, Shinobu just has to pass the dreaded Ninja Graduation Exam.
